Event PageÂ¶

In this page all the upcoming events are displayed along with their registration details.

This page is divided into the following sections:

  1. Code Camp : This is the first section where the link of the upcoming schedules are attached.

If you want to make changes in this section, carry out the following changes in code:

  • To make changes in the heading: Go to event1.html and search heading1, you will see <div> tag where you can make changes.

  • To make changes in the description: Go to event1.html and search heading-caption, where in caption1 and caption2 class you can make changes in the <p> tag.

  • To make changes in the link to schedule: Go to event1.html and search col get-info, you will see <a> tag where in href you can modify the link.

  • To change the background image: Go to event1.css and search header, in the url change the link to a different image. You can add new image in the ../assets/Images/event/image_name and then add this link in the url.

Note

  • To change image in responsive mode, change the link of the URL of background image within the media queries, As different background images are currently present for responsive views.

  1. About : This section describes about the how to kickstart as a beginner.

If you want to make changes in this section, carry out the following changes in code:

  • To make changes in the heading: Go to event1.html and search container-heading, you will see <div> tag where you can make changes.

  • To make changes in the description: Go to event1.html and search text-container, you will see <p> tag where you can make changes.

  • To change the image: Go to event1.html and search Image of event, you will see <img> tag where in href you can give path of the new image.

  1. Schedule : This section contains the timeline of all the events which are going to be conducted by your Girlscript Chapter.

If you want to make changes in this section, carry out the following changes in code:

  • To make changes in the heading: Go to event1.html and search schedule-heading, you will see <h2> tag where you can make changes.

  • To change the icon in the cards: Go to event1.html and search fa , you will see <i> tag where you can modify the class of your icon.

  • To modify the heading and description of card: Go to event1.html and search featured-schedule , you will see <h2> and <p> tag where you can modify the heading and the description respectively.

  • To change the time of the event: Go to event1.html and search time , you will see <h3> tag where you can make changes.

  • To add an additional event card: Go to event1.html and search col-sm-12 links, where you can copy the whole <div> and make changes accordingly.

Note

  • To get free vector images with high resolution refer this .

  • You can refer this where you can get different icons according to your requirement and you can copy the html code of the icon to add it in the code and do the further designing.

  1. Register: In this section, the registration of the upcoming event is done.

If you want to make changes in this section, carry out the following changes in code:

  • To make changes in the heading: Go to event1.html and search register-heading, you will see <h1> tag where you can make changes.

  • To make changes in the description: Go to event1.html and search register-para, you will see <div> tag where you can make changes.

  • To make changes in the link to register form: Go to event1.html and search register-btn, you will see <button> tag where in href you can modify the link.

  • To change the background image: Go to event1.css and search .register-section, in the url change the link to a different image. You can add new image in the ../assets/Images/event/image_name and then add this link in the url.

Note

  • To change image in responsive mode, change the link of the URL of background image within the media queries, As different background images are currently present for responsive views.

  1. FAQs: In this section all the general queries are answered.

If you want to make changes in this section, carry out the following changes in code:

  • To make changes in the heading: Go to event1.html and search faq-heading, you will see <h1> tag where you can make changes.

  • To make changes in the subheading: Go to event1.html and search faq-subheading, you will see <div> tag where you can make changes.

  • To modify the questions and answers: Go to event1.html and search question-border , you will see <h3> and <p> tag where you can modify the question and the answer respectively.

  • To add an additional FAQ: Go to event1.html and search faq-question, where you will see <div> with class row, you can copy the whole <div> and make changes accordingly.
